duties_responsibilities.duty: Project planning and management of energy efficiency and/or demand response programs.
Field technician recruitment, management, and installation support.
Deliver program financial and performance status reports.
Assist sales and engineering team in development of energy audits, M&V plans and cost estimating.
Review bid/contract packages for quality assurance.
Make recommendations to Local Service/Sales teams for improved customer support.
Monitor and update performance tracking reports and project deviations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Accounting, Economics, Energy Management, or Engineering
